page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The six square kilometres covered by Class 5 at Winnall County Primary School include a wide variety of land uses and amenities . In the south western corner is the heart of Winchester with the Cathedral and shopping centre . The residential areas to the North and East surround St.Giles Hill, which overlooks Winchester and from which it is possible to see the remaining parts of the area . Below in the Itchen Valley is the Winnall Industrial Estate which provides local employment and which is alongside the newly extended M3 which will join London and Southampton in 1988. Beside the factories flows the River Itchen which separates the industry from Winnall Moors which is an S.S.S.I. Beyond the Moors the land rises towards Headbourne Worthy and Easton Down.
